name: Starship (Maragato Entertainment)
description:
Blast away against sorties, terrain enemies and bosses, avoiding being ambushed as you collect power ups to activate new weapons, secret tokens for hidden levels and extra lives through 8 plus 4 bonus stages of ever-increasing difficulty. Can you find all of the secrets?

Featuring auto save, gamepad support and endless gameplay with progressive leveling up. Includes many classical background tracks.
